strings.Value: "Great. I can't wait to see your next creation."
"I wanted to order something specific from you."
"Thank you. But I don't need your services any more."
"Remind me, who are you and what are you working on?"

{n}The {d|Mim}goldsmith's{/d} face shines.{/n} "{mf|Your Grace|Your Grace|Your Highness|Your Highness}! Please accept this humble gift as a token of my deep affection... respect... and whatever else the rules tell me I'm supposed to say. I very much hope you like it – I worked hard on it!"
{n}Mim wrinkles her nose.{/n} "You can't dictate genius... But well, I suppose it's your right to try. What can I do for you?"
{n}The master craftsman nods at you pensively.{/n} "All right... I think I have a draft somewhere..."
{n}Smiling broadly, Mim looks away.{/n} "Believe me, I won't disappoint you."

{n}The master craftsman raises an eyebrow, surprised.{/n} "What, is my jewelry suddenly not good enough? You think too much of yourself... It's sad, too – I was only getting started. Anyway, I'm sure that I'll find a grateful patron in a more civilized land, who can appreciate creative work..."

"As long as I'm here... I had this brilliant idea. It's going to be something really special. Unique. Perhaps the best thing I've ever done..." {n}Mim brushes a forelock from her face.{/n} "It's only... I can't say what it's going to be EXACTLY..."
"But I know how to figure it out. But to do this, I'll need you to grant me three wishes. One is already fulfilled – there are two more to go. Please visit me in my workshop and I'll tell you more."

{n}The {d|Mim}jeweler{/d} bows before you wearily. Her face is full of pride, despite the dark circles under her eyes.{/n} "It's ready, {mf|Your Grace|Your Grace|Your Highness|Your Highness}. Don't even ask how long it took me to craft this thing... But I like the result!"

"I also wanted to tell you that I'm finally ready to start working on my masterpiece! My wishes have been granted! Now I know what I must set myself at creation, and hope I will be able to thank you for your help. Unless you require me to make something else first..."
"That means I can create my brilliant design... I can't wait to see your delight when it's ready!"

"Mim Wobblegander, the best jeweler of Restov – and your own {mf|barony|barony|kingdom|kingdom} too! My rings and amulets are the best you can imagine. Not only do they grant their wearers extraordinary powers, they are also exceptionally beautiful! Right now I'm seeking inspiration for a true masterpiece – a ring that will bring its wearer luck in every deed, increase {mf|his|her} accuracy and protect {mf|him|her} from curses."
